name: Red Velvet Mug Cakes
author: Reddi-wip
summary: An easy dessert recipe for red velvet cake with cream cheese frosting ready in minutes from the microwave.
ingredients: 2 cups Reddi-wip® Original Dairy Whipped Topping
½ cup dry red velvet cake mix
4 tablespoons Reddi-wip® Original Dairy Whipped Topping
directions: For cakes, spray insides of 2 large microwave-safe mugs with cooking spray
Whisk together 2 cups Reddi-wip, Egg Beaters, and cake mix in medium bowl
Place half of batter in each mug
Microwave each mug individually on HIGH 1 minute to 1 minute 15 seconds or until set
For frosting, stir together cream cheese spread, 2 servings Reddi-wip and sugar in small bowl until blended
Invert each cake onto a plate; top each with half of the frosting
